column4: hey, I'm trying to install the nvidia driver, but it says to exit X server, I tried the sudo /etc/init.d/gmd stop command, but it says unknown command, anyone know what to do?
does sudo work with other commands?
reboot and choose rescue mode from the grub options, then install the nvidia driver
there is something seriously wrong with your ubuntu install if you dont have a desktop -_-
I had that problem once but I'm not sure what I did to fix it. I do know what you can do that will alleviate all this hassle
and finally type 'envy' and the script will automatically install nvidia drivers for you
will this guide do the trick? http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=56835
just do what I said, its easier
